3.Installing Jekyll requirements: 1.ruby 2.ruby gems, is a packaging system for ruby. 3. Unix, Linux, OS

install jekyll

sudo gem install jekyll sudo gem install rdiscount (for markdown package)

4.How Jekyll Works yaml configuration _config.yml

pretty much like angularJS or any other modern front-end templates

5.Configuring the site create a new project for jekyll

create a new site

jekyll new myJsite which creates a site template

start the local server

jekyll serve starts the template, which enables jekyll to translate the variables in static html page to the final static html page. running on http://127.0.0.1:4000/

download the code from mijingo.com/code

File Directory site posts where posts are

layout: post title: Henry’s Statement date: September 20, 1880

— three dashes means the yaml content

What is a YAML file? Human-friendly data serialization standard popular with Python and Ruby on Rails project with key: value format

yaml.org to check specificaitons

// Build settings markdown: rdiscount rdiscount: extensions: [smart] permalink: /articles/:title
